segment.source: The Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK gives you several ways to monetize your app with ads.
segment.target: The Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK gives you several ways to monetize your app with ads.

segment.source: Display ads in your app
segment.target: Display ads in your app

segment.source: Display ads in your app
segment.target: Display ads in your app

segment.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive

segment.source: The Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK gives you several ways to monetize your app with ads.
segment.target: The Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK gives you several ways to monetize your app with ads.

segment.source: Display banner and video interstitial ads using the Microsoft advertising libraries
segment.target: Display banner and video interstitial ads using the Microsoft advertising libraries

segment.source: Make more money from your Windows apps by including banner and video interstitial ads.
segment.target: Make more money from your Windows apps by including banner and video interstitial ads.

segment.source: The ads show in Windows apps for PCs, tablets, and phones.
segment.target: The ads show in Windows apps for PCs, tablets, and phones.

segment.source: You can monitor your ad performance in real time by using the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
segment.target: You can monitor your ad performance in real time by using the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

segment.source: To include ads in your apps, use the AdControl and InterstitialAd controls in the advertising libraries that are distributed in the Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK.
segment.target: To include ads in your apps, use the AdControl and InterstitialAd controls in the advertising libraries that are distributed in the Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK.

segment.source: You can use these controls to show banner and video interstitial ads from Microsoft in your XAML or JavaScript/HTML apps for Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.
segment.target: You can use these controls to show banner and video interstitial ads from Microsoft in your XAML or JavaScript/HTML apps for Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.

segment.source: For more information, see Display ads using the Microsoft advertising libraries.
segment.target: For more information, see Display ads using the Microsoft advertising libraries.

segment.source: After you publish an app with ads, use the advertising performance report to track the performance of the ads.
segment.target: After you publish an app with ads, use the advertising performance report to track the performance of the ads.

segment.source: Use ad mediation for banner ads from multiple ad networks
segment.target: Use ad mediation for banner ads from multiple ad networks

segment.source: You can use the AdMediatorControl class in your XAML apps to optimize your advertising revenue by displaying banner ads from multiple ad networks.
segment.target: You can use the AdMediatorControl class in your XAML apps to optimize your advertising revenue by displaying banner ads from multiple ad networks.

segment.source: After you add this control to your app, you configure your ad mediation settings on the Windows Dev Center dashboard, and we take care of mediating banner ad requests from the ad networks you choose.
segment.target: After you add this control to your app, you configure your ad mediation settings on the Windows Dev Center dashboard, and we take care of mediating banner ad requests from the ad networks you choose.

segment.source: For more information, see Use ad mediation to maximize ad revenue.
segment.target: For more information, see Use ad mediation to maximize ad revenue.

segment.source: Differences between the Microsoft advertising libraries and ad mediation
segment.target: Differences between the Microsoft advertising libraries and ad mediation

segment.source: The Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK includes the libraries for Microsoft advertising and ad mediation.
segment.target: The Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK includes the libraries for Microsoft advertising and ad mediation.

segment.source: However, these libraries provide different classes and serve different purposes.
segment.target: However, these libraries provide different classes and serve different purposes.

segment.source: Use the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes in the Microsoft advertising libraries if you want to display banner or video interstitial ads in a XAML or JavaScript app.
segment.target: Use the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes in the Microsoft advertising libraries if you want to display banner or video interstitial ads in a XAML or JavaScript app.

segment.source: Use the AdMediatorControl class in the ad mediation libraries if you want to display banner ads from multiple ad networks in a XAML app.
segment.target: Use the AdMediatorControl class in the ad mediation libraries if you want to display banner ads from multiple ad networks in a XAML app.

segment.source: For more information, see What is the difference: AdMediatorControl or AdControl.
segment.target: For more information, see What is the difference: AdMediatorControl or AdControl.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK
